setting.name: HPPaperInfoEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: locked-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPPageOrientationEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: locked-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPPaperType
HPPhysicalPaperSizeEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: locked-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPPaperSource
setting.valid-values: Roll: ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-types") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-types" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']")) and ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']")); Tray2,UpperThenLower,LowerThenUpper,Autoselect: ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-types") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-types" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']")) and ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']")) and (not Printer has attribute "capabilities/media-source-pick/media-source[@name='Tray2']" or HPLowerTrayInstalled in {true}); Automatic: /* SW Automatic paper source */ * not has attribute "@pdl-key" and HPIsAutomaticAllowed in {true} or /* FW Automatic PaperSource - duplicate the standard paper source rule*/ * has attribute "@pdl-key" and (((not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-types") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-types" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']")) and ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']"))); *: ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-types") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-types" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-types" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-types/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']")) and ((not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and not * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes") or (* has attribute "allowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']") or (not * has attribute "allowed-media-sizes" and * has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes" and * not has attribute "disallowed-media-sizes/reference[@name='%HPPhysicalPaperSize%']"));

setting.name: HPDestinationPaperSource
HPDestinationPaperSourceEnabledState
HPPrintQuality
setting.default-value: best if ((HPColorMode in {AdobeRGB,colorsync}) or (HPPaperType has attribute "print-quality-pick[@default='best']")); * if HPPaperType has attribute "print-quality-pick[@default='%*%']";

setting.name: HPDuplexSubstitute
HPBindingMode
HPBindingModeEnabledState
HPTumbleMode
setting.default-value: duplex-tumble if HPDuplex in {true}; simplex otherwise;

setting.name: HPTumbleModeEnabledState
HPDryTime
setting.valid-values: *: HPDryTimeEnabledState in {mutable-enabled}; i0: ;

setting.name: HPDryTimeEnabledState
HPAMCColorModeType
HPColorMode
setting.default-value: colorsmart if HPSystemColorMatching in {AP_VendorColorMatching, AP_UnconstrainingColorMatching}; colorsync otherwise;

setting.name: HPPenConfig
HPPenConfigEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: mutable-hidden otherwise;

setting.name: HPPenConfigOptions
HPPenConfigOptionsEnabledState
HPGrayscaleMode
HPGrayscaleModeEnabledState
HPSaturation
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPSaturationEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPBrightness
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPBrightnessEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPColorTone
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPColorToneEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPImagingModeAutomatic
HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState
HPDigitalFlash
setting.valid-values: off: ; *: HPColorMatchingIsACM in {false} and HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden} and HPPrintQuality has attribute "./@image-enhancement[.='true']";

setting.name: HPDigitalFlashEnabledState
HPDigitalFlashImage
HPContrastEnhance
setting.valid-values: off: ; *: HPColorMatchingIsACM in {false} and HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden} and HPPrintQuality has attribute "./@image-enhancement[.='true']";

setting.name: HPContrastEnhanceEnabledState
HPContrastImage
HPRedEye
setting.valid-values: off: ; *: HPColorMatchingIsACM in {false} and HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden} and HPPrintQuality has attribute "./@image-enhancement[.='true']";

setting.name: HPRedEyeEnabledState
HPSmartFocusEnabledState
HPSmoothing
setting.valid-values: off: ; *: HPColorMatchingIsACM in {false} and HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden} and HPPrintQuality has attribute "./@image-enhancement[.='true']";

setting.name: HPSmoothingEnabledState
HPSmoothingImage
HPSharpness
setting.valid-values: off: ; *: HPColorMatchingIsACM in {false} and HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden} and HPPrintQuality has attribute "./@image-enhancement[.='true']";

setting.name: HPSharpnessEnabledState
HPSharpnessImage
HPInkDensityEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-ink-density']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPEdgeControlEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-edge-control']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPResolutionEnhancement
setting.default-value: true if Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-resolution-enhancement']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPResolutionEnhancementEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-resolution-enhancement']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPEconoModeEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-economode']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPLosslessCompression
HPLosslessCompressionEnabledState
HPCyanAdjustment
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPCyanAdjustmentEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPMagentaAdjustment
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPMagentaAdjustmentEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPYellowAdjustment
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPYellowAdjustmentEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPBlackAdjustment
setting.valid-values: i0: ; *: HPBlackAdjustmentEnabledState in {mutable-enabled};

setting.name: HPAutoWidthSensor
setting.default-value: true if not HPAutoWidthSensorEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden}; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPAutoWidthSensorEnabledState
HPColorSyncProfileEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: mutable-disabled if (HPColorMode in {application-managed}); mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPColorMatchingIsACM
setting.user-name: System Color Matching is Application Color Matching
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPSystemColorMatching in {AP_ApplicationColorMatching}; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPCompressionEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-compression-modes']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPPrintToDiskEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: mutable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-printtodisk']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPDontSendPCLEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-dontsendpcl']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPDumpRawImageEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-dumprawimage']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPSpeedMechEnabled
setting.single-valid-value: true otherwise;

setting.name: HPPhysicalPaperSizeIsBanner
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPPhysicalPaperSize has attribute "@banner[.='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPhysicalPaperSizeIsAutoDuplexable
setting.user-name: Physical Paper Size Is Auto Duplexable
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPPhysicalPaperSize has attribute "@duplex[.='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPhysicalPaperSizeIsBorderless
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPPhysicalPaperSize has attribute "@full-bleed[.='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPhysicalPaperSizeIsManualBorderless
setting.user-name: Physical Paper Size Is Manual Borderless

setting.name: HPPaperTypeSupportsBlackInk
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPPaperType has attribute "media-type-info/@black-only[.='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPIsPenConfigWithBlackPenRequired
setting.single-valid-value: true if Printer has attribute "capabilities/adjust-required-pen-config" and HPColorMode in {grayscale} and HPGrayscaleMode in {black-only} and (not Printer has attribute "capabilities/adjust-required-pen-config/@check-media-type-supports-black-only[.='true']" or HPPaperType has attribute "media-type-info/@black-only[.='true']") and (not Printer has attribute "capabilities/adjust-required-pen-config[@check-KCMY-media-type-supports-black-only='true']" or not HPPaperType has attribute "media-type-info/@csl-media-type[.='kHPHomer' or .='kHPGossimer' or .='kHPArchie' or .='kHPVanGogh' or .='kHPCosmo' or .='kHPZircon']"); false otherwise;

setting.name: HPIsPenConfigWithBlackPenRequiredEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/adjust-required-pen-config"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

setting.name: HPManualBorderless
setting.valid-values: false: not HPManualBorderlessStatus in {already}; true: HPManualBorderlessStatus in {allowed} and not (HPSystemDuplexing in {true} and HPDuplex in {true}) or HPManualBorderlessStatus in {already};

setting.name: HPManualBorderlessEnabledState
HPOversprayScaling
setting.default-value: i0 if HPOversprayScalingEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden}; i4 otherwise;

setting.name: HPOversprayScalingEnabledState
HPOversprayScalingMultiplier
HPPhysicalPaperSizeHasBorderlessAnalog
setting.user-name: Physical Paper Size has Borderless Analog

setting.name: HPSelectedPaperSizeIsBorderless
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPSelectedPhysicalPaperSize has attribute "@full-bleed[.='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPaperTypeSupportsBorderless
setting.single-valid-value: true if not Printer has attribute "$Root/capabilities/constrained-media-types/disallowed-media-types[@name='disallowed-media-borderless-types']/reference[@name='%HPPaperType%']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPPenConfigSupportsInColorsync
setting.single-valid-value: true if Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-penconfig-in-colorsync-ui' and .='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPFullSailIsActive
HPAdjustedPrintQuality
setting.single-valid-value: best if HPPrintQuality in {best, highest}; * if HPPrintQuality in {*};

setting.name: HPQuietMode
setting.valid-values: true: HPQuietModeEnabledState in {mutable-enabled}; false: ;

setting.name: HPQuietModeEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: mutable-enabled if Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-quiet-mode']"; notapplicable-hidden otherwise;

setting.name: HPMirrorFlip
setting.valid-values: true: HPMirrorFlipEnabledState in {mutable-enabled}; false: ;

setting.name: HPMirrorFlipEnabledState
HPSizeInfoReadingLockedEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden otherwise;

setting.name: HPSimpleImageEnhancement
setting.default-value: off if HPPrintQuality has attribute "./@image-enhancement[.='false']" or not HPColorMode in {colorsmart,grayscale}; basic otherwise;
setting.valid-values: *: (HPSimpleImageEnhancementEnabledState in {mutable-enabled}); off: ;

setting.name: HPSimpleImageEnhancementEnabledState
HPMinimizeBottomMargin
setting.single-valid-value: true if HPMinimizeBottomMarginEnabledState in {mutable-enabled}; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPMinimizeBottomMarginEnabledState
HPIsPDEContextEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: locked-hidden otherwise;

setting.name: HPDuplex
setting.valid-values: true: HPDuplexEnabledState in {mutable-enabled}; false: ;

setting.name: HPDuplexEnabledState
HPLowerTrayInstalled
setting.valid-values: true: not HPLowerTrayInstalledEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden}; false: not HPLowerTrayInstalledEnabledState in {locked-hidden};
setting.default-value: true if Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='ships-with-lower-tray' and .='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPLowerTrayInstalledEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/media-source-pick/media-source[@name='Tray2']"; /* Device doesn't support lower tray */ locked-hidden if not Printer has attribute ".//installable-option[@name='HPLowerTrayInstalled']"; /* Device supports lower tray but doesn't support installable option */ mutable-enabled otherwise; /* Device supports installable option */

setting.name: HPAutoDuplexerInstalled
setting.valid-values: true: not HPAutoDuplexerInstalledEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden}; false: not HPAutoDuplexerInstalledEnabledState in {locked-hidden};
setting.default-value: true if Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='ships-with-auto-duplexer' and .='true']"; false otherwise;

setting.name: HPAutoDuplexerInstalledEnabledState
setting.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "product/features/feature[@name='supports-auto-duplex' and .='true']"; /* Device doesn't support autoduplex */ locked-hidden if not Printer has attribute ".//installable-option[@name='HPAutoDuplexerInstalled']"; /* Device supports autoduplex but doesn't support installable option */ mutable-enabled otherwise; /* Device supports installable option */

preset.name: HPDigitalFlash
preset.single-valid-value: automatic if HPSimpleImageEnhancementEnabledState in {mutable-enabled} and HPSimpleImageEnhancement in {full}; off otherwise;

preset.name: HPDigitalFlashEnabledState
preset.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/digital-photo-info//setting[@name='digital-flash' and .='true']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

preset.name: HPContrastEnhance
preset.single-valid-value: automatic if HPSimpleImageEnhancementEnabledState in {mutable-enabled} and HPSimpleImageEnhancement in {full}; off otherwise;

preset.name: HPContrastEnhanceEnabledState
preset.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/digital-photo-info//setting[@name='contrast-enhance' and .='true']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

preset.name: HPRedEye
preset.default-value: automatic if HPSimpleImageEnhancement in {full}; off otherwise;

preset.name: HPRedEyeEnabledState
HPSmartFocus
preset.single-valid-value: automatic if HPSimpleImageEnhancementEnabledState in {mutable-enabled} and HPSimpleImageEnhancement in {full, basic}; off otherwise;

preset.name: HPSmartFocusEnabledState
preset.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/digital-photo-info//setting[@name='smart-focus' and .='true']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

preset.name: HPSmoothingEnabledState
preset.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/digital-photo-info//setting[@name='smoothing' and .='true']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

preset.name: HPSharpness
HPSharpnessEnabledState
preset.single-valid-value: notapplicable-hidden if not Printer has attribute "capabilities/digital-photo-info//setting[@name='sharpness' and .='true']"; mutable-enabled otherwise;

preset.name: ImageEnhancementSettingData
preset.default-value: automatic if HPImagingModeAutomaticEnabledState in {notapplicable-hidden} and HPPrintQuality in {best, highest} and HPColorMode in {colorsmart,grayscale}; off otherwise;
